remarks: If you can swap arguments one and three of a betweenness statement, then those arguments are identical.  (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 7-Oct-2013.)
statement: btwnswapid2 $p |- ( ( N e. NN /\ ( A e. ( EE ` N ) /\ B e. ( EE ` N ) /\ C e. ( EE ` N ) ) ) -> ( ( A Btwn <. B , C >. /\ C Btwn <. B , A >. ) -> A = C ) ) $.
